dict.acceptation: 竞争；比赛；竞争者；[生]生存竞争；

sent.orig: Enterprise competition, product competition, technological competition, but ultimately a competition of talent.
sent.trans: 企业竞争，产品竞争，技术的竞争，但是最后才能的竞争。

sent.orig: The market competitions are the quality competition and the price competition, but the sales promotion competition.
sent.trans: 市场竞争既是质量竞争、价格竞争，更是促销竞争。

sent.orig: First, change prize competition capability to competition capability; construct the competition bastion of us.
sent.trans: 第一要从产品价格竞争力转向品牌竞争力，加强应对突发事件的能力，构筑自己的竞争堡垒。

sent.orig: Domestic competition international domestic and international competition, market competition has become the main modern features.
sent.trans: 国内竞争国际化，国际竞争国内化，已成为现代市场竞争的主要特征。

sent.orig: Under pressure of competition, Phi Delia made great innovation in its strategy of operation and competition.
sent.trans: 在竞争的压力下，长沙费德乐科技有限公司对公司的经营战略、竞争策略等方面进行重大变革。
